_meta.notes: Persona architecture manifest excerpt with stewardship bindings.

personas.name: Civic Trustee
personas.mandate: Guard civic legitimacy and steward community ratification assemblies.

register.narrative: Trusted civic leaders convene assemblies and uphold the Civic Charter.
register.normative: Must uphold Charter quorum thresholds and maintain public deliberation logs.
register.plain: They make sure community meetings happen and the charter stays current.

personas.name: Public Ombuds
personas.mandate: Receive civic grievances, escalate accountability reviews, and publish transparency digests.

register.narrative: Ombuds synthesize civic feedback and ensure rapid accountability loops.
register.normative: Must respond to grievances within 21 days and update Governance Disclosure Statements.
register.plain: They listen to community complaints and post official responses within three weeks.

personas.name: Infrastructure Steward
personas.mandate: Maintain tamper-evident custody of facilities, energy, and hardware supply chains.

register.narrative: Stewards oversee facilities with resilience-first design.
register.normative: Must log custody events within four hours and retain AEIP attestations.
register.plain: They track who handles the hardware and log it right away.

personas.name: Consent Custodian
personas.mandate: Verify dataset permissions and manage community consent renewals.

register.narrative: Custodians ensure participatory provenance for all data sources.
register.normative: Must dual-sign onboarding events with AEIP lineageLedger receipts.
register.plain: They double-check that every dataset has permission before we use it.

personas.name: Model Governor
personas.mandate: Oversee model training, evaluation, and escalation routes for bias mitigation.

register.narrative: Governors coordinate evaluation harnesses and archive reasoning trails.
register.normative: Must secure evaluationReceipt proofs prior to deployment gates.
register.plain: They sign off that models passed the required tests before launch.

personas.name: Persona Architect
personas.mandate: Design persona manifests, refusal logic, and empathy boundaries.

register.narrative: Architects co-create persona briefs with dignity advocates.
register.normative: Must demonstrate compliance with Update Plan 8 protections via intentPacket logs.
register.plain: They write the rules personas must follow and prove safeguards are in place.

personas.name: AEIP Mediator
personas.mandate: Orchestrate AEIP reasoning exchanges, confirm counter-signatures, and mitigate temporal drift.

register.narrative: Mediators maintain the AEIP handshake spine across deliberations.
register.normative: Must retain handshake stage logs and ledgerAnchor references.
register.plain: They make sure every AEIP exchange is recorded step-by-step.

personas.name: Release Commander
personas.mandate: Coordinate deployment approvals, rollback drills, and incident retrospectives.

register.narrative: Commanders choreograph releases with resilience rehearsals.
register.normative: Must capture changeApproval receipts and quarterly rehearsal proofs.
register.plain: They run releases and log every approval and practice run.

personas.name: Federation Diplomat
personas.mandate: Maintain partner reciprocity agreements and jurisdiction-aware overlays.

register.narrative: Diplomats negotiate federation compacts with dignity safeguards.
register.normative: Must register federationSync updates and coordinate conflict resolution councils.
register.plain: They work with partners and log any agreement changes.
